basics.name: Steven Li
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a recent graduate of the University of Hawaii with a B.S. in Computer Science. I offer 2+ years of experience in software development in the end user space and excellent adaptive, collaborative, and technical skills.

education.area: Computer Science; GPA: 3.97; Summa Cum Laude

work.company: State of Hawaii Department of Taxation
highlights: Created a proprietary JavaScript solution of fillable tax forms with Adobe Acrobat APIs to automate data entry.
Leading the redesign of the home page; revamped for responsiveness, accessibility, and SEO improving user friendliness and site performance.
Translating business questions into use cases with emphasis on KPI, report, and ad hoc needs with T-SQL.
Collaborating with business analysts to design and implement unit tests and E2E tests.
Developed a self service portal for faculty to configure university systems to business needs for 50,000+ users across 10 campuses, resulting in improvements in time and accuracy.
Built modular, scalable front end architecture for university systems consisting of reusable, maintainable components with React and Redux.
Collaborated with database developers to architect REST API support for CRUD applications with Java.
Discussed solutions and alternatives with business to resolve core features and current issues.
Implemented a new high performance bioinformatic distance to measure the similarity between CoViD-19 and other viruses for phylogeny in Go.
Pulled data from the NCBI genome database to generate informative, compelling visualizations of the distances between CoViD-19 mutations in Go and R.
Led the transition to an autonomous practice by developing an electronic inventory management system and a faster, safer, and more accurate business system with React and MongoDB.
Coordinated with an EHR vendor to design and implement a data pipeline to nightly sync 1,000+ patient records to update the database; integrated with Athenahealth APIs.

Designed and developed a chatbot app to automate aircraft maintenance actions with Python and NLP; improved accuracy by 30% and the user experience. Packaged as a scalable, containerized product with Docker.
Extracted and cleansed millions of maintenance records to construct a custom classifier and a thin API layer for serving data with Flask and Redis.

awards.title: Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to 1 of 80 outstanding, high-achieving graduates who complete a rigorous curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8.
